# Summarisation
```{python}

mtcars = r.mtcars
# Print the head of the sales DataFrame
print(mtcars.head())

# Print the info about the sales DataFrame
print(mtcars.info())

# Print the mean of weekly_sales
print(mtcars["mpg"].mean())

# Print the median of weekly_sales
print(mtcars["mpg"].median())
```
